title: Naupang te tak te chauh kan ni
lyrics:
Naupang te tak te chauh kan ni,
Hmun ropuiah kan piang hek lo;
Mahse, Isua Chhandamtu hian,
A hnathawhah min tanpui fo.

Kristian naupangten ni tinin,
Indona tam tak kan tawk ang;
Sualna zawng zawng hneh thei turin,
Aw Isu, keiini min pui rawh.

Kristian naupangin kraws puinn,
Hrehawm leh hlauhawm kan tuar ang;
Isua zuiin, a rawngbawlin,
A hnenah kanthlen ve theih nan.
